derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps an alteration of Provençal espigou(n), from Latin spiculum, diminutive of spicum, variant of spica (see spica)

entry.def: A spigot is a faucet or tap.

means.word_mean: 1. a faucet for drawing water from a pipe or cask
2. a plug for a bunghole in a cask
